org.apache.heron.grouping

Class AbstractTupleRoutingTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.heron.grouping.AbstractTupleRoutingTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomGroupingTest, EmitDirectBoltTest, EmitDirectSpoutTest

    public abstract class AbstractTupleRoutingTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract test to verify that tuples can be routed according to custom logic. Specific tests should extend this and override the initSpout(..), initBoltA(..) and/or initBoltB(..) methods as necessary to achieve the desired routing logic.
